mapper.select: SELECT b.subject_no subjectNo ,b.subject_board_no subjectBoardNo ,n.subject_notice_no subjectNoticeNo ,n.member_id memberId ,n.subject_notice_title subjectNoticeTitle ,n.subject_notice_content subjectNoticeContent ,n.create_date createDate ,t.teacher_name teacherName FROM subject_notice AS n INNER JOIN subject_board AS b ON n.subject_notice_no = b.subject_board_no INNER JOIN teacher t ON t.member_id = n.member_id WHERE b.subject_no = #{subjectNo} ORDER BY n.create_date DESC LIMIT #{startRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM subject_notice AS n INNER JOIN subject_board AS b ON n.subject_notice_no = b.subject_board_no WHERE b.subject_no = #{subjectNo}

SELECT b.subject_board_no subjectBoardNo ,b.subject_no subjectNo ,n.subject_notice_no subjectNoticeNo ,n.member_id memberId ,n.subject_notice_title subjectNoticeTitle ,n.subject_notice_content subjectNoticeContent ,n.create_date createDate ,t.teacher_name teacherName FROM subject_notice n INNER JOIN subject_board b ON n.subject_notice_no = b.subject_board_no INNER JOIN teacher t ON t.member_id = n.member_id WHERE b.subject_board_no = #{subjectBoardNo}

SELECT f.subject_file_no subjectFileNo ,f.subject_file_board_no subjectFileBoardNo ,f.subject_file_name subjectFileName ,f.subject_file_original_name subjectFileOriginalName ,f.subject_file_type subjectFileType ,f.subject_file_size subjectFileSize ,b.subject_board_no boardNo FROM subject_file f INNER JOIN subject_board b ON subject_board_no = subject_file_board_no WHERE subject_board_no = #{subjectBoardNo}
SELECT f.subject_file_name FROM subject_file f INNER JOIN subject_board b ON b.subject_board_no = f.subject_file_board_no WHERE b.subject_board_no = #{subjectBoardNo}
